headline: SpaceX Plans Explosive Test  Of a System  For Safety
abstract: A successful demonstration of the abort system on the companyâ€™s Crew Dragon capsule would set up the next flight, which is to have astronauts aboard.
lead_paragraph: Because of rough seas in the Atlantic, SpaceX called off a test on Saturday that would have destroyed a rocket in flight to demonstrate that its spacecraft are safe for astronauts.
